articles.description: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra shared a bunch of sweet pictures from their daughter Malti Marie's recent birthday party—check them out here!
articles.content: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra's adorable daughter Malti Marie is officially two, and the couple celebrated by throwing her an Elmo-themed party attended by family and friends. Honestly, didn't know … [+1283 chars]

articles.title: 2024 BAFTA nominations snubs include major Oscars contenders - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: The 2024 BAFTA nominations included major snubs for Oscars contenders like 'Barbie' director Greta Gerwig and 'Killers of the Flower Moon' frontrunner Lily Gladstone.
articles.content: Barbie just took a major hit from Oppenheimer on the awards trail, as the BAFTA Awards nominations shut out its filmmaker, Greta Gerwig among many other shocking snubs from the Best Director category… [+4898 chars]
